name: Hera Auth Security Monitor
description: Authentication & Authorization vulnerability detection. Monitors OAuth/OIDC/SAML/SCIM flows, JWT tokens, session security, password strength, MFA usage, and common auth misconfigurations.

content_scripts.comment: Non-auth detectors disabled: subdomain-impersonation, dark-pattern, phishing, privacy-violation, risk-scoring
WebAuthn API interceptor - MUST run in MAIN world to intercept navigator.credentials
WebAuthn relay - forwards MAIN world messages to background via chrome.runtime

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://cloudflare-dns.com https://ipapi.co https://ip-api.com; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none';
